content: materials - main color mc cascade yarns 220 superwash yarn color lot 250 - 3-4 balls of 100g - accent color ac yarn and colors epic yarn color ecru - 1-2 ball of 100g - us size 8 needles gauge - for 2 inches 10 stitches and 13 row size - xs/s m/l xl/2xl 3xl/4xl - bust width 18 inches 20 25 in 24 in 28 in - length 16 inches 16 in 16 in 16 in 18 in - neck width 8 inches 8 in 8 in 10 in 10 in - armhole length 10 inches 10 in 10 in 10 in 12 in front/back knit 2 pieces flat - cast on 85 100 120 140 stitches with ac - ribbing - knit in k1p1 twisted rib for 4 row - switch to mc knit in k1p1 twisted rib for 2 row - switch to ac knit in k1p1 twisted rib for 3 row - switch to mc knit in k1p1 twisted rib for 1 row - body - with mc knit in stockinette stitch for 30 row - row 31 cast off 2 knit to end - row 32 cast off 2 purl to end - *row 33 k1 k2tog knit to last 3 stitches ssk k1 - row 34 purl* - repeat ** until row 50 - continue in stockinette for 30 more row until row 80 80 80 95 - neckline shaping - row 81 knit 37 sts cast off 4 knit 37 sts - piece is now split into two halves which will be worked separately - side one - *row 82 purl to last stitch slip one purlwise - row 83 cast off 3 knit to end* - repeat ** until row 89 89 93 93 - knit in stockinette until row 96 - row 97 cast off - side two - *row 82 cast off 3 purl to end - row 83 knit to last stitch slip one purlwise* - repeat ** until row 88 88 92 92 - knit in stockinette until row 96 - row 97 cast off neckline - placing both body pieces together right sides out seam top of shoulders together using mattress stitch - pick up stitches along neckhole using ac knitting in the round - knit in k1p1 twisted rib for 2 row in ac - switch to mc knit in k1p1 twisted rib for 2 row - switch to ac knit in k1p1 twisted rib for 3 row - cast off using stretchy bind off method sleeves - seam up sides of body pieces using mattress stitch from bottom of ribbing to start of armhole decreasing - using ac pick up stitches along armhole knitting in the round - with ac knit in k1p1 twisted rib for 2 row - switch to mc knit in k1p1 twisted rib for 2 row - switch to ac knit in k1p1 twisted rib for 3 row - cast off - repeat for other sleeve finishing - weave in ends
